Package DAO

Class AppointmentsDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentsDaoImpl
public abstract class AppointmentsDaoImpl extends Object
In this class we will have the Create, Read, Update and Delete files for the appointments table from the MySQL server.

    • getAppointmentForContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentForContact(int contactId) throws Exception
      This method is used to filter out the appointments based on the contact is which is provided. LAMBDA EXPRESSION: In this method, the lambda's expression makes the determination of the contact id matching. I created this solution to simplify my code.
      Parameters:
      contactId - the contact if which you are looking for appointments
      Returns:
      Returns a list of appointments for the contact id provided.
      Throws:
      Exception
